bibl.title: Бакхилид Дитирамб 18: Тесеј препев и коментари. [Bacchylides Dithyramb 18: Theseus. Translation and Commentaries.]
bibl.note: Translation. - Analysis and comments: 1. Who is Bacchylides?; - 2. What is dithyramb?; - 3. Mythological story in Dithyramb 18; - 4. Structure of Dithyramb 18; - 5. Style and language. - Avec résumés en macédonien et en anglais.

bibl.title: Systasis. E-journal of the Association of Classical Philologists "Antika"

bibl.seg: Daniela Toseva Nikolovska, Бакхилид Дитирамб 18: Тесеј препев и коментари. [Bacchylides Dithyramb 18: Theseus. Translation and Commentaries.]
Systasis. E-journal of the Association of Classical Philologists ""Antika"" 27 (2015) 13 pp.

Translation. - Analysis and comments: 1. Who is Bacchylides?; - 2. What is dithyramb?; - 3. Mythological story in Dithyramb 18; - 4. Structure of Dithyramb 18; - 5. Style and language. - Avec résumés en macédonien et en anglais.
